subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: With Jason Kidd out, the Knicks’ Raymond Felton had to be the dominant ball-handler against the Nets, but he played his worst game. Felton will get a second chance to step up against the Bucks.
snippet: With Jason Kidd out, the Knicks’ Raymond Felton had to be the dominant ball-handler against the Nets, but he played his worst game. Felton will get a second chance to step up against the Bucks.
